hero_image.alt_text: A village in the Snæfellsnes peninsula of western Iceland

main_content.text: I’m Frank. Welcome to my ever-growing space on the web. A digital garden for continuous growth. Join me as I share my photography, travels, and other stories along the way.

sections.alt_text: A view of the Canadian Rocky Mountains at the top of the Banff Gondola in Alberta, Canada

sections.text: Photography is one of my passions in life. I love incorporating it into other aspects of my life and capturing the world around me.
I’m a dad, husband, traveler, minimalist, ux engineer, and rock climber.

sections.alt_text: Frank's desk setup and essential items

sections.text: Minimalism has been a part of my life for years. Live deliberately. Curate the things around you.
Creating this digital space from design to implementation provided the perfect base to hone my craft as a UX practitioner.
